Name: Battle Imagine - Muku Warrior
Description:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of Muku Warrior - Stunt! Super Critical.

Stunt! Super Critical
Resonate with the power of Elite Muku Warrior, leap forward to launch a powerful attack, dealing area Attack Damage. This attack is guaranteed to critically hit, and increases your Crit rate and critical damage bonus for 20s.
Description$english:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of Muku Warrior - Stunt! Super Critical.

Stunt! Super Critical

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
